nodes.text: The heavy blaster arm was a commercial heavy blaster-equipped mechanical limb for protocol droids. Commonly sold in pairs, the arms were cylindrically shaped and possessed a dark gray color. The product was traded during the Clone Wars, a major galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems from 22 to 19 BBY.

The heavy blaster arm was part of the Protocol Droid Part Pack II for players in the online game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures. The heavy blaster arm, along with the Tusken language pack, could be bought for 300 Station Cash.
